actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.
Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources discharged by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A bill to designate the Lowndesville Recreation Area located within the Richard B. Russell Dam and Lake project, South Carolina and Georgia, as the "Jim Rampey Recreation Area".

summary.text: Designates the Lowndesville Recreation Area, located within the Richard B. Russell Dam and Lake project, South Carolina and Georgia, as the Jim Rampey Recreation Area.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Lowndesville Recreation Area located within the Richard B. Russell Dam and Lake project, South Carolina and Georgia, as the "Jim Rampey Recreation Area".
